column1: When the Goddess of Fortune deserts a house
column2: she usually leaves some of her burdens behind
column3: and this ancient family was still encumbered with its host of dependents
column4: though its own shelter was nearly crumbling to dust. These parasites take it to be an insult if they are asked to do any service. They get headaches at the least touch of the kitchen smoke. They are visited with sudden rheumatism the moment they are asked to run errands. Therefore
column5: all the responsibilities of maintaining the family were laid upon Rashmani herself. Women lose their delicacy of refinement
column6: when they are compelled night and day to haggle with their destiny over things which are pitifully small
column7: and for this they are blamed by those for whom they toil.Besides her household affairs Rashmani had to keep all the accounts of the little landed property which remained and also to make arrangements for collecting rents. Never before was the estate managed with such strictness. Bhavani had been quite incapable of collecting his dues: Rashmani never made any remission of the least fraction of rent.
